amendment.description: Amendment creates authority within NIH to conduct a prize program with intent to incentivize health innovation by offering competitors the chance to win a prize for creating breakthrough research and technology.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 114-193 to create authority within NIH to conduct a prize program. The intent of the program would be to incentivize health innovation by offering competitors the chance to win a prize for creating breakthrough research and technology.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (IN) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Young (IN).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (IN) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
